title: If there is one thing the game never failed to deliver, it's good musics.
body:
And the latest proof of this statement is Nunu and Willump's login screen theme which is phenomenally good.

To Riot Talondor and all of the music team, you guys are the best. I love you all. Thank you.

replies.body: {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} So glad to hear you're enjoying their theme! This one was a lot of fun to work on as we were able to record some of my favorite instruments & tie music into their story (with Layka playing a significant influence). Thanks again for listening & your kind words, this made my morning <3
so far besides swain, this is the best rework of this year.
I quite like the Swain rework actually, I main him now.
The Swain rework was awesome indeed, but I think Nunu and Willump easily surpasses him.
Yea I might main him too, I do very well as him

The only problem is the whole assassin meta thing that makes it incredibly hard for mages like swain. Also I agree that the Nunu & Willump rework is probably going to be the best one of the year, it certainly is now.
This rework made Nunu and Willump become my favorite champions.
Right did gud with this one
I honestly think this might be the best rework ever done.
ehhh your forgetting about warwick.

I mean, they have failed to deliver a couple times.

Dark Star Cho was a good theme, but it never actually got used.

Aatrox was a good theme, but it was only used for one day.

Hopefully Nunu's music won't get shoved off because "We need to use the preseason 8 theme again".
yes! please no more preseason 8 theme!!!

It's a shame they make all this good music, and then replace the logins like a day later with "OMFGWORLDSTOURNAMENTLCSBIGPLAYS!!!!!!!!!!!" login or revert to the boring as fuck Poppy/Jinx/Luci/Jhin/Galio login.
I quite enjoyed Akali's login theme music. Just very zen and thrilling at the same time to me.

Anyone notice Nunu's eyes O_O

They fixed it based RITO

I love Riot's music team! They create beautiful music with each release!

Fell in love with Irelia's login theme just because of the strings and Ornn's for the deep humming.
this game has music? I always play with the game sound off, don't even know what the last like 10 champions sound like

The game has tons of musics.
LoL's YouTube channel have a login screen playlist, I suggest you to go check it out if you haven't yet.
Additionally, there are numerous themes that aren't officially released but that you can find on YouTube, like the SR and the Bilgewater map soundtracks.
I find the Bilgewater map theme incredibly similar to the "Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge" theme.
Well yeah, it's basically the same but longer.
Well, something like music or splasharts isn't held back by the gameplay, so the creative design of it can go full ham, which you can feel in the music,
